snippet.title: SKYLANDERS SPYRO'S ADVENTURE Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
CGRtrailers, from Classic Game Room®, presents the official launch trailer for SKYLANDERS SPYRO'S ADVENTURE from Activision. Gamers will have the ability to bring action figures (of Spyro and Skylanders) to life via some pretty cool looking portal device. A different departure from what you would expect from Spyro, but it is an interesting concept. Skylanders Spyro's Adventure is going to be on the Mac, Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo Wii, PC, PlayStation 3 (PS3) and Xbox 360 systems. The release date is set for October 16, 2011. Enjoy!

Check out more video game trailers from Classic Game Room's CGRtrailers at http://www.youtube.com/CGRtrailers

Get more Classic Game Room on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/ClassicGameRoom
